com.hadoop.compression.lzo
Class LzopCodec

java.lang.Object
  com.hadoop.compression.lzo.LzoCodec
      com.hadoop.compression.lzo.LzopCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec
public class LzopCodec
extends LzoCodec

A CompressionCodec for a streaming lzo compression/decompression pair compatible with lzop. http://www.lzop.org/
